title: S17 Ep102: Dark Matter Monsters: Bigfoot, Ball Lightning, UFO's Appearing Together w/Dr. Simeon Hein
itunes:title: Dark Matter Monsters: Bigfoot, Ball Lightning, UFO's Appearing Together w/Dr. Simeon Hein
description:
Darkness Radio presents Dark Matter Monsters: Bigfoot, Ball Lightning, UFO's Appearing Together with Researcher/Author Dr. Simeon Hein!

On today's episode, we talk with Dr. Hein about whether Bigfoot is a flesh and blood creature or exists outside three dimensions! We also discuss why there are multiple phenomena happening around Bigfoot. Also, why are some people having docile, pleasant experiences with Bigfoot, others having incredibly terror filled, or rageful incidents with the cryptid!

Get the book "Dark Matter Monsters..." here:  https://www.amazon.com/dp/097158639X

Check out Dr. Simeon Hein's website, where you can check out his You Tube and other ventures: https://mountbaldy.com/
